bill.summary: 3/23/1988--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Commerce to ensure that during any decennial census: (1) no member of the armed forces, or dependent of such member, is excluded based on such member's being assigned to a post outside the United States; and (2) any alien not lawfully admitted for permanent residence is not included.
